_header: O lady I shall me dress with busy cure
Subjects: love lyrics; lovers, addresses to beloved

BodArcSelB24.First Lines:
O lady I schall me dres with besy cureWith hert and mynd for to do
                    [ ]ol sarvant…
BodArcSelB24.Last Lines:
…[ ] my hart so neirhaf pete of me cative bond &
                    thrall
BodArcSelB24.Note: Damaged by damp with some loss of text.
BodArcSelB24.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 197-8.
